name: Hono
title: hono.dev
shortDescription: Hono is a web framework designed for developers who need a fast, lightweight solution for building web applications. It supports multiple JavaScript runtimes, ensuring compatibility across platforms like Cloudflare, Fastly, Deno, and AWS. With built-in middleware and first-class TypeScript support, Hono simplifies the development process, making it ideal for projects requiring high performance and clean APIs. An example use case could be developing a serverless application that runs efficiently on various cloud environments.
cons: Limited community compared to larger frameworks
May require familiarity with Web Standards APIs
Lesser known, which might affect third-party integrations
